findings.title: Potential unauthorized access in feeTo
findings.description: The 'feeTo' variable is declared as external and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized access in feeToSetter
findings.description: The 'feeToSetter' function has been marked as external and does not have proper access control, potentially allowing unauthorized access.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized access in getPair
findings.description: The getPair function may allow unauthorized access.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized access in allPairs
findings.description: The allPairs function may allow unauthorized access.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized access in allPairsLength
findings.description: The 'allPairsLength' function may allow unauthorized access.

findings.title: Reentrancy vulnerability in createPair
findings.description: A reentrancy vulnerability exists in the createPair function.

findings.title: Reentrancy vulnerability in setFeeTo
findings.description: The setFeeTo function is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Reentrancy vulnerability in setFeeToSetter
findings.description: The function setFeeToSetter is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Reentrancy vulnerability in updateTaxesAccrued
findings.description: A reentrancy vulnerability exists in the updateTaxesAccrued function.

findings.title: Reentrancy vulnerability in transfer
findings.description: The contract has a reentrancy vulnerability in the transfer function.

findings.title: Reentrancy vulnerability in approve
findings.description: A reentrancy vulnerability exists in the approve function, allowing an attacker to drain the contract's funds.

findings.title: Reentrancy vulnerability in transferFrom
findings.description: The transferFrom function is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Reentrancy vulnerability in swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: A reentrancy vulnerability exists in the function swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens, allowing an attacker to drain the contract's funds.

findings.title: Reentrancy vulnerability in swapExactTokensForTokens
findings.description: A reentrancy vulnerability was found in the swapExactTokensForTokens function.
